document_data.mainbody:
Arleanda was a Wearer of Purple within the Dragonwell cell of the Cult of the Dragon during the late 14 century DR. She was tasked with overseeing ogre laborers who were excavating the caves around the Well of Dragons.
Arleanda was known for preferring academic interests over other pursuits.
Arleanda was in charge of the excavation of the cave when an ancient tablet was discovered by Reveilaein Brant, a young and brash cult member who served as the mostly disregarded apprentice of Vargo Kent. The tablet was an ancient relic of the draconic demigod Kalzareinad,
